bug.author: zm801
bug.description: ERROR TentaclePackageManager Installation failed for tentacle module 'hybrid_trading_mode' (Fail to install configuration / resource : 404: Not Found: <denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Drakkar-Software/OctoBot-Tentacles/master/Trading/Mode/HybridTradingMode.json>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Drakkar-Software/OctoBot-Tentacles/master/Trading/Mode/HybridTradingMode.json</denchmark-link> )

comments.comment: Hello zm801, Did you activate dev-mode in config.json ?
Hi Guillaume, in this installation case, "DEV-MODE":true has been added in config.json.
Hi zm801, Which is this installation case ? Did you use python sources, package, docker or binary ?
Hi Herklos, I used python sources.

Hi zm801, HybridTradingMode is not ready yet, it should not be used (that's why it is in dev-mode only). This error is not preventing other mode to install, it will not affect you. We will fix this problem in the next version, thank you for reporting the issue ! Guillaume
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Drakkar-Software/OctoBot-Tentacles/commit/0e2b940813612ac2847a3b14e6f0c146fad53b1a>The problem is fixed</denchmark-link> , you can now try again.
